meanings.definition: To convert (a text written in code, or a coded signal) into normal language.
meanings.sent1: She deciphered the secret message and read it aloud.
meanings.sent2: The detective deciphered the cryptic note left at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: After many failed attempts, she finally deciphered the code and found the treasure.
meanings.sent4: His keen eyes deciphered the hidden meaning behind her words.
meanings.sent5: With great effort, he deciphered the ancient script etched on the stone tablet.

meanings.definition: To interpret the meaning of (something puzzling or hard to understand).
meanings.sent1: The teacher deciphered the complex math problem for the students.
meanings.sent2: She carefully deciphered the emotions behind his words.
meanings.sent3: Trying to decipher the cat's meows can be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: She deciphered the underlying message in his silence.
meanings.sent5: The artist deciphered the beauty hidden in the chaos of the painting.
